opportunities: Competitors rank higher for delivery keywords

recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Philadelphia", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Philadelphia Pennsylvania", "top pizza Philadelphia", "pizza restaurant near me", "pizza food Philadelphia" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords

reviews.text: Their pizza is very good, I love the different salads. Always fresh! The steak sandwich is delicious and made the way you want.Hoagies are always made fresh on fresh rolls, even their naked and boneless wings are very delicious made with the sauce of your choice.Everyone is very friendly. Their prices are very reasonable for the food you order.

I had 2 slices and my friend had a chicken ceasar wrap.
Usually, when to order slices they are flat and have no cheese. This was different. They had lots of cheese and the buffalo chicken was great. My friend loved the wrap and I might try a hoagie next time. They are built for speed of service and have amazing customer service. Highly recommended

I saw this place on the map and walked in off the street having seen some good reviews and never having been here. I ordered the Eggplant Parmiciana/Parmigiana Sandwich (I should have walked out when I saw they mistakenly wrote ‚ÄúParmesan‚Äù on the menu tbh) and the Medium Cheese Pizza.

The food wasn‚Äôt seasoned, like at all. It didn‚Äôt even taste like they used salt in the pizza - a little bit in the dough at most. The pizza was also very undercooked but maybe they expect customers will finish cooking it in our home ovens so it can be freshly cooked at home. The fried eggplant tasted like other things that had been fried in the oil. They toasted the bread and fried the eggplant very well though, which were redeeming aspects of the meal.

Although one other staff member greeted me at the door, the red haired man at the register seemed to have a discriminatory judgmental attitude when I asked a clarifying question about the menu. I didn‚Äôt see any slices listed on the menu so I thought maybe this was supposed to be an ironic pizzeria. I asked, laughing, if this is a place called ‚ÄúSlices‚Äù that doesn‚Äôt sell slices.

He gave a disjointed response, seemingly with an attitude, that they were almost closing so that‚Äôs why they didn‚Äôt have many slices out on display. I didn‚Äôt ask about that so it was a confusing response and I hadn‚Äôt even been past the register so I didn‚Äôt see that they had anything on display, and like I said I knew almost nothing about this place beforehand. It just seemed like he judged me based on how I look, unless he treats everyone this way. If he doesn‚Äôt treat everyone this way, why else did he single me out other than something that can be perceived visually? We had no prior interaction.

The atmosphere is bright lights and no decor.

This pizza is amazing and so is their hoagies, salads‚Ä¶ well, you get it!
SHOUT OUT TO BRYCE‚ÄôS EDUCATION ON YOUR FOOD AND GAVE ME A FEW I HAVE INDEED TRIED.
My granddaughter has to have a piece every time I get dropped off or coming to pick me up. Lol thank you for your fabulous food and making us both, Skylar and me, love to spilt a half pizza cheese for her and half pizza üçï for me!!

Like that best friend you can either spend a week straight with and not get sick of, or see each other once every 3 months, it‚Äôs always a good time. Slices is that consistent friend you can rely on. An East Falls staple for well over 10 years, Slices always serves consistently good Pizza (Food). Whether it‚Äôs a cheesteak with mushrooms & peppers, a chicken cheese, chicken tenders, or a slice, you can always count on Slices to deliver solid food to satisfy your craving. Prepared quickly on site, or call ahead. They also give you little pizza slice magnets for every $20 you spend. Collect a pie and get a free small pizza. No phone numbers. No email address. Just ‚Äúthank you for your business‚Äù. I hope this establishment continues to be a part of the East Falls community for years to come.

editorial_summary.overview: Counter-service joint with gourmet pizza & salads, plus hoagies, wings & cheesesteaks.

Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.text: This is the place! Fresh ingredients. I get a pie and wings from them weekly. Always good and I get a friendly greeting every time no matter who's behind the counter. Oh, and fantastic cheesesteaks without the fuss like some other places. I don't want to start a fight and say they're the best cheesesteak in a Philly(they are I'm just not saying it), but if you give them a shot they'll definitely be in your top 3.
Great pizza, reliable quick delivery. All salads and other food freshly made. Highly recommend.
Visiting with my daughter great food

detailedReviews.author: Katie Harrity
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the world

detailedReviews.author: mac es
detailedReviews.text: Great slice great price!üçï

detailedReviews.author: Ken M
detailedReviews.text: This is the place! Fresh ingredients. I get a pie and wings from them weekly. Always good and I get a friendly greeting every time no matter who's behind the counter. Oh, and fantastic cheesesteaks without the fuss like some other places. I don't want to start a fight and say they're the best cheesesteak in a Philly(they are I'm just not saying it), but if you give them a shot they'll definitely be in your top 3.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Ann Braycich
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, reliable quick delivery. All salads and other food freshly made. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Bernita Salley
detailedReviews.text: Visiting with my daughter great food

detailedReviews.author: John Kenney
detailedReviews.text: I love this place and go there often, I like that they have the option of seeded or non-seeded rolls. I get cheesesteak on the seeded roll and buffalo chicken cheesesteak on non-seeded, the wraps are very good as well I don't think it's on the menu but I asked them to make me a cheesesteak wrap and they said no problem  I also have a favorite salad there it's the South of the border with chicken

detailedReviews.author: Stanford Saunders
detailedReviews.text: The Supreme Pizza is very good. The dough was excellent  not too  chewy ,,it was light and crispy

detailedReviews.author: lydia thomas
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is very good, I love the different salads. Always fresh! The steak sandwich is delicious and made the way you want.Hoagies are always made fresh on fresh rolls, even their naked and boneless wings are very delicious made with the sauce of your choice.Everyone is very friendly. Their prices are very reasonable for the food you order.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Thuman
detailedReviews.text: This is a great neighborhood pizza shop. It's not going to draw in tourists or influencers or be something you write home about, but for reliably good food, convenience, always good service, fair prices, it's really appreciated!

detailedReviews.author: jesse gallagher
detailedReviews.text:
I had 2 slices and my friend had a chicken ceasar wrap.
Usually, when to order slices they are flat and have no cheese. This was different. They had lots of cheese and the buffalo chicken was great. My friend loved the wrap and I might try a hoagie next time. They are built for speed of service and have amazing customer service. Highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Michael Mahan
detailedReviews.text: Reminds me of City View style. Solid slice.

detailedReviews.author: At'tallah Shabazz (L.L.C)
detailedReviews.text: I've ordered here twice since moving to the neighborhood. The food has been on ‚òùÔ∏è point. I will definitely order again

detailedReviews.author: Corinne Germanotta
detailedReviews.text:
I saw this place on the map and walked in off the street having seen some good reviews and never having been here. I ordered the Eggplant Parmiciana/Parmigiana Sandwich (I should have walked out when I saw they mistakenly wrote ‚ÄúParmesan‚Äù on the menu tbh) and the Medium Cheese Pizza.

The food wasn‚Äôt seasoned, like at all. It didn‚Äôt even taste like they used salt in the pizza - a little bit in the dough at most. The pizza was also very undercooked but maybe they expect customers will finish cooking it in our home ovens so it can be freshly cooked at home. The fried eggplant tasted like other things that had been fried in the oil. They toasted the bread and fried the eggplant very well though, which were redeeming aspects of the meal.

Although one other staff member greeted me at the door, the red haired man at the register seemed to have a discriminatory judgmental attitude when I asked a clarifying question about the menu. I didn‚Äôt see any slices listed on the menu so I thought maybe this was supposed to be an ironic pizzeria. I asked, laughing, if this is a place called ‚ÄúSlices‚Äù that doesn‚Äôt sell slices.

He gave a disjointed response, seemingly with an attitude, that they were almost closing so that‚Äôs why they didn‚Äôt have many slices out on display. I didn‚Äôt ask about that so it was a confusing response and I hadn‚Äôt even been past the register so I didn‚Äôt see that they had anything on display, and like I said I knew almost nothing about this place beforehand. It just seemed like he judged me based on how I look, unless he treats everyone this way. If he doesn‚Äôt treat everyone this way, why else did he single me out other than something that can be perceived visually? We had no prior interaction.

The atmosphere is bright lights and no decor.

detailedReviews.author: Dana Cook
detailedReviews.text:
I threw everything up within 10 minutes after finishing what I could eat. A large dry cheese pizza and a 8 piece garlic parm naked wings. The wings tasted stale and old with no seasoning, my pizza was dry and tasteless.
My food didn‚Äôt stay down for 10 minutes my stomach is so upset. This is the 2nd time this has happened. Not sure what‚Äôs going on, but I probably won‚Äôt be ordering anything again.

Do better, wash your hands, change your gloves, clean your utensils. Actually put some care and effort into what you‚Äôre doing.

detailedReviews.author: Jimmy Williams
detailedReviews.text: Awesome experience

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Jaffe
detailedReviews.text: Like that best friend you can either spend a week straight with and not get sick of, or see each other once every 3 months, it‚Äôs always a good time. Slices is that consistent friend you can rely on. An East Falls staple for well over 10 years, Slices always serves consistently good Pizza (Food). Whether it‚Äôs a cheesteak with mushrooms & peppers, a chicken cheese, chicken tenders, or a slice, you can always count on Slices to deliver solid food to satisfy your craving. Prepared quickly on site, or call ahead. They also give you little pizza slice magnets for every $20 you spend. Collect a pie and get a free small pizza. No phone numbers. No email address. Just ‚Äúthank you for your business‚Äù. I hope this establishment continues to be a part of the East Falls community for years to come.

detailedReviews.text:
This pizza is amazing and so is their hoagies, salads‚Ä¶ well, you get it!

detailedReviews.author: LILolhead
detailedReviews.text: Eggplant Parmesan SOOO GOOD & MEATBALL SUBüòãüòãüòãüòãüòã

detailedReviews.author: Horace Jr Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Great

detailedReviews.author: Jay Phill
detailedReviews.text: This resturant is one of the rare ones that acutally still sell slices of pizza. This was great to experience!!! Popped in for lunch and grabbed to slices for 9 bucks. It was delicious... Definitely will visit again

detailedReviews.author: m green
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is da bomb!

detailedReviews.author: John Luczkowski
detailedReviews.text: Slices is definitely one of the two best pizza places in the East Falls neighborhood of Philly. The food is always delicious and the orders always arrive within the window of time they provide and are always accurate. The only "knock" I could give them is they're a bit expensive, but that seems to be the case the past few years across the board because of inflation. But they're my go to "I don't feel like cooking" pizza spot in the neighborhood.

detailedReviews.author: Red Symphony
detailedReviews.text: LOVE their wings and veggie pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Javier Garcia
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza slices were delicious, great service and friendly staff.
Slice of pepperoni is definitely a reason to go back.

detailedReviews.author: Roxanne Brown
detailedReviews.text: my experience was great as usual, no issues whatsoever

detailedReviews.author: Wild G Cat
detailedReviews.text: Delicious mozzarella sticks. Fast service and the staff was very nice.  They were very busy but you could see that they were working as a team to get the orders out.  I'll def go back to try the pizza that looks amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Danine Carruth
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was okay.  Needed more sauce. Didn't have much flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Alex Sch
detailedReviews.text: A great neighborhood pizzeria. Jimmy is so nice and attentive. They don't make pizza places like this anymore and I'm glad I found it.

detailedReviews.author: Tommy Winters
detailedReviews.text: Used to frequent this establishment , is run by completely incompetent management and lie about their prices the tables are dirty and filthy inside I would never again go into this business or buy a single thing from them. Heed my advice

detailedReviews.author: Abigail F
detailedReviews.text:
This place is Sooooo delicious!!! My favorite things so far are the connection salad with apples, walnuts, dressing, and cranberries. I also love the eggplant parm sub. And the Cesar Salad with chicken and a variety of crutons is so good, too. They have slices of pizza always ready for purchase, and you get a slice magnet. Once you fill a pizza with slice magnets, you get a free pizza!

The employees are so nice and try to accommodate your interests and help you decide on the menu.

They have a different small business drop-off desserts, which include a cheesecake, chocolate cake, and oreo cheesecake.

They have pepsi beverages in bottles for purchase. Inside has seating for probably 12 people. And there is a TV inside too. It's a small place, so most get their items to go. You can order ahead online with their easy to use website.

I moved into the apartments down the road, so I will be back. And to take photos of my food because I was in a hurry last visit.

detailedReviews.author: Stacey Pittman
detailedReviews.text: Quick Delivery and food was fairly hot.

detailedReviews.author: Gio Hatter
detailedReviews.text: Nice place coolest staff

detailedReviews.author: Peter Beardsley
detailedReviews.text:
Slices were slay on the pizza. Made for a nice stop while biking at Fairmont
Park Philadelphia. I appreciated the taste and friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Tori Ashley
detailedReviews.text: Our go to Pizza spot. Food is always great, on time with delivery and good prices. We love their pizza, stromboli, appetizers and breaded wings.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer J
detailedReviews.text:
Friendly, professional service, great food, and reasonable prices. My husband and I usually order their XL taco pizza, which is HUGE and loaded with delicious toppings. We absolutely love it! Their other, more traditional pizza varieties are great as well, as are the side orders. Their garlic knots are fantastic! Slices (in East Falls) delivers to a fairly wide range of areas; delivery typically takes 25 to 45 minutes depending on how busy they are.
An added bonus is their refrigerator magnet collection program. Every order comes with a magnet shaped like a slice of pizza, and when you've collected 8 of them (to form a full pizza shape), you can redeem them for a free large pizza.
If you sign up online, you'll also receive weekly coupons via text message (if you opt to).
I would highly recommend Slices to anyone in the mood for good pizza and/or other casual fare.

detailedReviews.author: Debby Bowman
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza , great value,great people,must try

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Nyce
detailedReviews.text: Not very many places where you can get a slice or 2 of Pizza for a quick lunch. Drove from Bala . Excellent cheese on the pizza! On my goto list!

detailedReviews.author: stephanie thompson
detailedReviews.text: Really nice pizza shop..the food is really good and the staff is super friendly!

detailedReviews.author: Layla Spearman
detailedReviews.text: Although I have previously genuinely loved slices, they do not ‚Äúdeliver to my area‚Äù of strawberry mansion despite being 5 minutes driving away. They cancelled my order and suggested to use a third party app (Grubhub) and they do not provide services through there and i do not drive. I wish more transparency about this issue was offered and I am upset because I do want to support this business. I hope changes are able to be made or more discretion about not providing services to certain areas.

detailedReviews.author: T Ball
detailedReviews.text: Brought a medium 4 topping pizza for a whopping $22 which is ridiculous for a nasty and very overpriced pizza  . The crust was horrible it tasted like cardboard the vegetable toppings were cut wrong and raw .They definitely need to learn from successful pizza places how to build and flavor a proper pizza if they are going to ask for this price. The only thing at this point I would recommend from Slices is the steak hoagies and the cold hoagies which which are pretty good you don't feel like your being ripped off like the nasty pizza. Slices  needs to hire  people who put love in and know how to make a serious pie with the name  Slices so people who know how a pie is supposed to  taste wouldn't  be so disappointed .I'm still upset at the crappie pizza they sold me they need to go back to school and learn pizza 101 .

detailedReviews.author: C
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is decent, but sometimes I've ordered and it's been soggy. Not soggy with sauce but like... soggy wet. Not sure what that is about. Oddly, what I love the most is their "Beyond Com-PEAR" salad. If you love a sweet salad, it's sooo good. I also like that you can collect magnets to get a free pizza. The staff is friendly--typical pizza place vibes.

detailedReviews.author: Pat Gorman
detailedReviews.text: Had an issue with their online ordering and they took care of the situation, great service and great food

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Keller
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Shawna H.
detailedReviews.text: I had Naked Wings (Hot) & small Greek salad. I liked that the wing sauce gave a kick but wasn‚Äôt so hot you couldn‚Äôt enjoy. Wings were dry. Greek salad didn‚Äôt have whole olives or anchovies. Overall food wasn‚Äôt nasty but wasn‚Äôt too tasty either.

detailedReviews.author: tony hillanbrand
detailedReviews.text: One of my favorite pizza around plus with every order you get a slice magnet üòé eight magnets you get yourself a free pizza great deals and delivery guys coming outta retirement enough work for the neighborhood guys and outta neighborhood guys üòé

detailedReviews.author: Lenora Edwards Edwards
detailedReviews.text: Slices was very easy to order from online I also appreciate that my food was delivered within the said time in fact it arrived 7 minutes earlier !!!üòäwhat great service

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Cunningham
detailedReviews.text: Had a burger and fries it was hot and delicious üòã.

detailedReviews.author: Mykala Harris
detailedReviews.text: Catering is always good. I always order for my job. Asked for extra mayo on my hoagie and it was barely any mayo on it. It was dry.

detailedReviews.author: Ronda Winfield
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best cheesesteaks in Philly!  Great service and always clean when I pick up from store.  Gave 4 stars because pickles on sandwiches are so thick.  Every time I order on my cheesesteak I have to take off and reslice.  Other than that food is delicious

detailedReviews.author: Monica Siltman
detailedReviews.text: Picked up hoagies. Ready in 20 minutes as promised and enjoyed by all. Thanks.

detailedReviews.author: Marjorie Thomas
detailedReviews.text:
I have been ordering from Slices for tears. The food us always fresh and delicious: salads, puzza, steaks,
Everything!!!

detailedReviews.author: Alexandra Gerber Levick
detailedReviews.text: Slices was great - we put in a large order and they were kind, professional, and when we had to adjust the order for more people, they took care of it. Will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Bruce Marshall
detailedReviews.text: Best ever food, friendly efficient staff, and great prices. Perfecto!

detailedReviews.author: Anne Disalvatore
detailedReviews.text: Damn good piece of pizza

detailedReviews.author: Tasia Cowart
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm sorry but their pizza is just not good. I ordered a medium margherita pizza that was $17.. it was literally a cheese pizza with tomato, super thick mozzarella pieces (almost inedible), and basil‚Ä¶ The cheese is super thick and there‚Äôs never enough sauce. I‚Äôve been here a few times every time the pizza is gross. If I ever come back it will probably be for anything other than pizza. Too expensive, bad quality.

detailedReviews.author: Myles Loughlin
detailedReviews.text: Asked for well done Curly fries. Got em. Asked for a ramekin of ketchup. Got it. Fries were cooked perfectly. Chicken cheesesteak was delicious and they went the extra mile including the ramekin of ketchup. Great spot. Will order again.

detailedReviews.author: Brittany Galanti
detailedReviews.text: Quick, great service, affordable, and yummy

detailedReviews.author: Barnett Pearlstein
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great price

detailedReviews.author: Chris Cofone
detailedReviews.text: Slices is always amazing. I have ordered multiple different things and never have had a bad experience. The food is cost friendly, and always tasty. From the pizza to the breaded wings, the strombolis & salads they do not disappoint.

detailedReviews.author: Rafiq Mapp
detailedReviews.text: Some of the BEST Steaks in the city!!!

detailedReviews.author: Glenn Stankovics
detailedReviews.text: Nice Friendly staff. Fast and Correct Delivery all the time. We order often for our business lunches. Great Food.

detailedReviews.author: Ashante Hargrove
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasant experience. Food is good too.

detailedReviews.author: Cooper Nelson
detailedReviews.text: We got the BBQ chicken pizza and a regular pepperoni. Both were great, but the pepperoni pizza might have been the best pepperoni I‚Äôve ever had in my life. So much great cheese, pepperoni tasted perfect. Wish I would have tried this place earlier in our trip so we could have eaten it more than once.

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Gardner
detailedReviews.text: Delivery is always quicker than expected.   Food is always hot and yummy.  Great take out option in our neighborhood üëç

detailedReviews.author: Shelby Smith
detailedReviews.text: The food and service are always an A+

detailedReviews.author: Erica Curbelo
detailedReviews.text: I only order for delivery, but the delivery guys are always good and quick..the food is always delicious!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the fresh ingredients and customizable options, such as choosing between seeded or non-seeded rolls and creating custom wraps. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is praised for its quick and reliable delivery service, making it a convenient choice for customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Friendly and consistent customer service is a standout feature, with customers receiving a warm greeting every time. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about food quality and customer service - review management can address this concern
Lack of transparency and service area issues for delivery - social media marketing can improve this area
Lack of ambiance and decor complaints - social media marketing can improve this area

negative.author: Dana Cook
negative.text:
I threw everything up within 10 minutes after finishing what I could eat. A large dry cheese pizza and a 8 piece garlic parm naked wings. The wings tasted stale and old with no seasoning, my pizza was dry and tasteless.
My food didn‚Äôt stay down for 10 minutes my stomach is so upset. This is the 2nd time this has happened. Not sure what‚Äôs going on, but I probably won‚Äôt be ordering anything again.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
